1.name: District 1
1.description: District 1 is the city center of Zurich.

2.name: District 2
2.description: District 2 is located on the east side of Lake Zurich.

3.name: District 3
3.description: District 3 is known for its diverse cultural scene.

4.name: District 4
4.description: District 4 is a vibrant and trendy area with many bars and clubs.

5.name: District 5
5.description: District 5 is an up-and-coming neighborhood with a mix of residential and industrial areas.

6.name: District 6
6.description: District 6 is home to the University of Zurich and ETH Zurich.

7.name: District 7
7.description: District 7 is located on the western outskirts of the city.

8.name: District 8
8.description: District 8 is known for its luxurious residential areas and beautiful parks.

9.name: District 9
9.description: District 9 is a mainly residential area with a mix of modern and traditional architecture.

10.name: District 10
10.description: District 10 is located in the northern part of the city.

11.name: District 11
11.description: District 11 is a predominantly residential area with several parks and green spaces.

12.name: District 12
12.description: District 12 is located in the southeastern part of Zurich.
